custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT {AssetEntrySet.*} FROM AssetEntrySet INNER JOIN AssetSharingEntry AS AssetSharingEntry1 ON (AssetSharingEntry1.classPK = AssetEntrySet.assetEntrySetId) INNER JOIN AssetSharingEntry AS AssetSharingEntry2 ON (AssetSharingEntry1.classNameId = AssetSharingEntry2.classNameId) AND (AssetSharingEntry1.classPK = AssetSharingEntry2.classPK) WHERE ( (AssetEntrySet.createTime [$CREATE_TIME_COMPARATOR$] ?) AND (AssetEntrySet.parentAssetEntrySetId = ?) ) AND (AssetSharingEntry1.classNameId = ?) AND ([$SHARED_TO$]) ORDER BY AssetEntrySet.createTime DESC
SELECT DISTINCT {AssetEntrySetLike.*} FROM AssetEntrySetLike WHERE (AssetEntrySetLike.classNameId <> ?) AND (AssetEntrySetLike.classPK <> ?)
